insights: Created comprehensive Analytics dashboard with 134 lines of placeholder UI
Implemented date range selector (7/30/90 Days, All Time) with export functionality
Displays 4 key metrics cards (Views, Engagement, Subscribers, Conversion) with change percentages
Includes visual bar chart placeholder with 12-month data representation
Channel breakdown section showing TikTok (36%), Blog (30%), Email (34%) distribution
Uses purple accent color scheme (purple-100, purple-600, purple-700)
Well-documented with JSDoc comment explaining features to be implemented
Configuration management page with 113 lines of placeholder UI
Implements tabbed interface with 3 sections: API Keys, Services, Workspace
API Keys section displays 3 placeholder keys (TikTok, OpenAI, SendGrid) with masked values
Each API key card includes service label, creation date, Copy and Delete actions
Add API Key button in header with blue accent color scheme
Service Configuration section placeholder for future forms
Uses blue color scheme (blue-100, blue-600, blue-700) for visual distinction
System Health monitoring page with 105 lines of placeholder UI
Overall status card showing 'All systems operational' with green health indicator
Service status grid displaying 6 services (TikTok API, Blog Engine, Email, Python Agents, Database, Cache)
Each service card shows Status, Uptime (99.9%), and Last Check timestamp
Recent Activity log section with 4 placeholder items using skeleton loaders (animate-pulse)
Uses green color scheme (green-100, green-500, green-700) for health indicators
Skeleton loading pattern applied to activity log for future dynamic content
Main Dashboard page (truncated in diff, appears to be ~60 lines based on comment)
Serves as central hub for organic marketing component overview
Uses LayoutDashboard icon from lucide-react with slate color scheme
Intended to display KPI overview, recent activity, health status, and performance charts
Entry point route for dashboard layout group
Root page file (modified/created)
Likely serves as landing or redirect page to dashboard

patterns_discovered.description: All pages follow identical layout: header with icon + title/subtitle, followed by content sections
Each route uses distinct accent color: Analytics (purple), Config (blue), Health (green), Dashboard (slate)
patterns_discovered.purpose: Visual differentiation and quick navigation recognition

patterns_discovered.description: Every page header includes rounded-lg background with icon and descriptive subtitle
patterns_discovered.implementation: Consistent spacing (gap-3) and sizing (h-6 w-6 icons)

patterns_discovered.description: Each page includes comprehensive JSDoc documenting features to be implemented
patterns_discovered.benefit: Clear roadmap for feature development without blocking route creation

patterns_discovered.description: Metrics displayed in responsive grid (md:grid-cols-2, lg:grid-cols-3/4)
Activity logs use animate-pulse for future dynamic content
Icon library used consistently across all pages for visual consistency

gotchas_discovered.description: All metrics, service names, and activity data are hardcoded in component render
gotchas_discovered.impact: Will require data binding refactoring when connecting to backend APIs

gotchas_discovered.description: All buttons (Export Report, Add API Key, Copy, Delete, Tab switches) lack onClick handlers
gotchas_discovered.impact: Routes are presentational only; interactivity must be implemented in next phase
gotchas_discovered.example: Export Report button in analytics has no functionality

gotchas_discovered.description: config/page.tsx shows tab styling but no state management or conditional rendering
gotchas_discovered.issue: Only 'API Keys' tab appears selected; other tabs don't switch content
gotchas_discovered.requires: Client component conversion and state management

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Chart is ASCII/HTML, Not Real Visualization
gotchas_discovered.description: analytics/page.tsx Performance Over Time uses div height percentages, not actual chart library
gotchas_discovered.implication: Will need integration with charting library (Chart.js, Recharts, etc.) for real data

gotchas_discovered.description: health/page.tsx shows hardcoded 'Operational' status and '99.9%' uptime for all services
gotchas_discovered.concern: No actual health monitoring; real metrics must be fetched from backend

gotchas_discovered.description: Tailwind grid breakpoints (md:, lg:) are set but untested for actual responsive behavior

approach_outcome.strategy: Create complete route structure with high-fidelity placeholder UI components
execution: Established App Router directory structure using (dashboard) layout group pattern
Created 5 route pages with comprehensive placeholder UI using Tailwind CSS
Applied consistent design patterns across all pages (headers, cards, grids, colors)
Used JSDoc comments to document planned features without implementation
Leveraged Lucide React icons for visual consistency
Implemented responsive design with Tailwind breakpoints
approach_outcome.completeness: Routes are structurally complete and visually functional as placeholders
next_steps: Implement actual data fetching and API integration
Convert presentational components to interactive client components
Add state management for tab switching, date ranges, filtering
Integrate real charting library for analytics visualizations
Connect health monitoring to actual service status endpoints

recommendations.recommendation: Convert pages to Client Components ('use client') where interactivity is needed
recommendations.rationale: Button handlers, tab switching, and form submissions require client-side state

recommendations.recommendation: Create API client layer to fetch metrics, health status, and API keys
recommendations.rationale: Current hardcoded data will not scale; centralized fetching enables real updates

recommendations.recommendation: Integrate charting library (Recharts or Chart.js) for analytics graphs
recommendations.rationale: Current div-based chart is not scalable for real data representation

recommendations.recommendation: Implement tab state management in config/page.tsx
recommendations.rationale: Tabs currently show static content; user cannot switch between API Keys/Services/Workspace

recommendations.recommendation: Extract repeated card components into reusable components
recommendations.rationale: Metric cards, service cards, and key cards follow similar patterns

recommendations.recommendation: Add aria labels and semantic HTML improvements
recommendations.rationale: Current implementation lacks accessibility attributes for screen readers
recommendations.scope: All pages - add role, aria-label to icon containers

recommendations.recommendation: Create test suite for route accessibility and responsive rendering
recommendations.rationale: Verify Tailwind breakpoints work as intended across device sizes

recommendations.recommendation: Add Storybook stories for each placeholder page
recommendations.rationale: Visual regression testing and component showcase for stakeholders
recommendations.benefit: Easier to communicate completed placeholder state to team
